mlm-desc: Mediawiki extension to manage multi language in one MediaWiki.
action-language: add, edit and delete translations using the MultiLanguageManager inferface
mlm-error-title-istalkpage: "$1". Talk pages can not be translated
mlm-error-lang-notallowed: Language "$1" is not allowed for translation
mlm-error-lang-alreadytraslated: There is already a translation for language "$1"
right-language: Add, edit and delete translations using the MultiLanguageManager interface
apihelp-mlm-tasks-param-task: The task that should be executed
apihelp-mlm-tasks-param-taskData: JSON string encoded object with arbitrary data for the task
